argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eqcoe1ply1eq.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | eqcoe1ply1eq.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | eqcoe1ply1eq.a | |- A = ( coe1 ` K ) |
| 4 |  | eqcoe1ply1eq.c | |- C = ( coe1 ` L ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_eqcoe1ply1eq | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) -> ( A. k e. NN0 ( A ` k ) = ( C ` k ) -> K = L ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( K = L -> ( coe1 ` K ) = ( coe1 ` L ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) /\ K = L ) -> ( coe1 ` K ) = ( coe1 ` L ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 3, 4 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) /\ K = L ) -> A = C ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) /\ K = L ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> A = C ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) /\ K = L ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( A ` k ) = ( C ` k ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) /\ K = L ) -> A. k e. NN0 ( A ` k ) = ( C ` k ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ex | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) -> ( K = L -> A. k e. NN0 ( A ` k ) = ( C ` k ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ K e. B /\ L e. B ) -> ( A. k e. NN0 ( A ` k ) = ( C ` k ) <-> K = L ) ) |
